content: I do not have personal preferences. however, i can suggest that the choice of festival will depend on your interests and the time of year you are visiting munich. oktoberfest and the tollwood winter festival are two of the most popular and well-known festivals, but if you prefer something more cultural or musical, you may want to consider the munich opera festival or the long night of music. if you visit during christmas, the christkindlmarkt can be a great option. it all depends on what you are interested in experiencing.
